amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funds in the Nuclear Energy account by $25,000,000 and increase funds in the Science account by $25,000,000.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Nuclear Energy (Yucca Mountain high-level waste repository) by $25 million and to increase funding for Science (high energy physics) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Heck (NV) amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 335 (Roll no. 325).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Heck (NV) amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 335 (Roll no. 325).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Heck (NV).
